text: @aproko_doctor Covid-19 isn’t the worse to happen to mankind, the whole inflated numbers isn’t even up to that of the seasonal flu and yet they are panicking everyone...vitamin c or even selenium can take care of it..Doctors are prolly scared or they don’t know their job.
